version_description:
1.7 is massive rewrite of Texpad to improve workflow, typesetting and collaboration with a new, modernised, UI improves your workflow and makes LaTeX easier to write than ever. Highlighted features below

Typesetter:

- Brand new onboard type

Maintenance update

- Switch added to allow you to turn off autotypeset when on battery power to preserve battery life
- Fix for crash when typesetting on 32-bit ios devices
- Fix for crash with pdf viewer on iPhone when exporting and no pdf c

* Image files are no longer selectable from the outline
* Fix for bug with live preview introduced in 1.7.1

* Work on accessibility features with the iOS screenreader
* Fix for an issue where File modification dates would not update in the file browser immediately after closing a file
* Fix for an issue where the install/uninstall switch label would not r

* Fix for rare crash when connecting to TPC documents
* Fix for subfiles when opening files via the Document Picker
* Fix for a bug when closing documents with TPC
* Fix for bug where the file browser could get "trapped" in a subfolder
* Fix for typesetting with cyrillic fonts

* Fixed bug that could cause crashes whilst typesetting

* Added an "Ignore All" button to the automatic file create dialogue
* Added support for
* \mintinline in the editor
* python package in the editor, and typeset autosense

This update is focussed on providing a better editing experience across all devices.
It is especially noticeable for those using external keyboards with the new generation of iPad Pros, and iPhone users.
A number of issues that arose with iOS 10 hav
* Fix for typesetting files with non-ascii characters in the cloud
* Fix for crash

* New cloud file sync system
* Fixes and improvements for working offline with Dropbox
* Support added for WebDAV, browse your WebDAV server from within Texpad's file browser and work offline
* Added synchronisation system to the internal

* Fix for crashes on 32 bit devices
* Fix for crash that could occur when trying to restore File Picker imports on boot
* Fix for input statements that include paths from a parent folder, e.g. `\input{../somefile}`

- Improved logging in the case of errors
- Updates for iOS 11
- Upgrades to internal typesetter, and fixes for
- Nested PGF transforms (affecting beamer, pgfplots, commutative diagrams and others)
- standalone class
- mdframed p

- iOS 11 update
- Fixes for issues with 32 bit devices
- Problem with Dropbox support where it would show `/` instead of the folder name
- Problem with bundle manager where it would appear not to connect
- Added better error messages w

- Suppressed the new iOS 11 quotes behaviour by default as curved quotes break LaTeX typesets
- Altered UI to be compatible with iPhone X
- Bugfixes for
- Crash when opening the pdf viewer when no pdf found on disk, and no typeset result had

- Fix for problem where remote Dropbox changes would not show up automatically after bringing Texpad out of the background after a long period
- Updated the typesetter bundles
- Local typesetter works with spaces in the filename
- Fixes for
- Fix for the Dropbox linking problem

- Full release of version 1.8.0
- Delivers major functionality updates
- Improved local typesetter that addresses support for many more packages than 1.7
- Support for Files app linking to iCloud and other apps supporting Document Picker API
-

- Fix for
- Crash in Bibliography tool
- Bug in Unicode math autosense
- Misc issues with internal typesetter
- Bug where restarting app would unlink iCloud folder links
- Bug where files appeared temporarily blank when
Fix for bug with iOS 3rd party edit in place

- iOS 13 Compatibility
- Add indexer to TexpadTeX, you can now typeset documents with indices locally rather than in the cloud
- Fixes
- Fix for problem with linking folders in iOS 13
- Fixed crash in file browser
- Performance
Misc. bug fixes, especially with interaction with Files app

- Misc. stability improvements
- Fix for broken popover button in iOS 12

- Numerous stability improvements
- Fixes to glossary and index compilation
- Scroll lock issues fixed
- File opening problem fixed
- Misc. typesetter bug fixes
- Unclassified capacity problem fixed
- Occasional live typeset usin

- Fix for the problem with the coordinated file access (accessing files on file servers and USB drives)
- Further improvements to cloud storage files via Files app
- A reported crash fixed
- Various stability improvements

- Fix for the problem with the coordinated file access (accessing files on file servers and USB drives)
- Further improvements to cloud storage files via Files app
- A reported crash fixed
- Various stability improvements
